attributes.additional_details: We aim to extend school hours so that students can get the homework and/or coursework finished within school hours leading to more free time after school in the evenings and also free weekends without having to do homework and having to worry about doing it if you have no idea, also if students do homework and/or coursework with teacher supervision they can get help whenever they need it.

rejection.details: There is no legal requirement on the length of the school day. The governing body decides when sessions should begin and end on each school day.
